name: aeronaut
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who travels in a flying vehicle such as a hot-air balloon or airship: This was the first time an aeronaut had crossed the Pacific Ocean alone in an air balloon.
More examplesFewer examplesThe aeronaut was known for his balloon flight from San Diego, California, to Waverly, Georgia.Santos-Dumont was a pioneering Brazilian aeronaut who built the world's first airships.Balloonist Sadler had two sons who assisted him and also became professional aeronauts. Rolls is best known for founding the Rolls-Royce company in 1904, but he was also a keen aeronaut.
